briefTitle: A Health Education Intervention Tailored for Malay-Muslim Women
officialTitle: A Culturally-responsive Health Communication Intervention for Malay-Muslim Women on Breast Cancer Screening
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Incidence Rate Ratio of Mammogram Uptake by Arm
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Identifying as Malay-Muslim woman
* Aged 50-69
* Citizens or permanent residents of Singapore
* No history of breast cancer
* Had not gone for mammogram screening in the last 2 years

Exclusion Criteria:

* No basic fluency in the Malay language
* Not able to provide a coherent response
* Declined photography of the education session
